alert.note: Alert for Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 4:24PM AKST until November 23 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Lower Kuskokwim Valley, including Crooked Creek, Sleetmute, Stony River, and Lime Village. * WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to 4 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will begin as snow late Wednesday afternoon or early evening. Snow will then become mixed with or change to freezing rain during the evening hours. The greatest chance of ice accumulation will be from Wednesday evening through Wednesday night. By Thursday, any freezing rain that falls will likely be very light and patchy.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
